text: == Events == * June 4 — Henry III becomes King of Germany. * The Abbey of Bec is founded. * Bretislav I of Bohemia invades Poland. == Deaths == * 10 March — Eudes of Aquitaine, Duke of Gascony * June 4 — Conrad II, Holy Roman Emperor * Iago ab Idwal ap Meurig, Prince of Gwynedd * Unsuri, Persian poet
